p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Form completed by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 31st March 1876.

Total — Two hundred pounds −
shillings and
−
pen
